name: Ominouscent
description:
There are a few reasons why I'm posting this here. First, I need to gauge people's interest in the idea to find out whether it's even worth doing to begin with. The second reason is the more obvious one: I'm trying to raise enough money to buy time with. Time that'll allow me to work on this project full-time and without having to worry about the elephant in the room we all have: THE BILLS GUY!!

        With that being said, I hope that you'll enjoy this demo.

Sincerely,

Ryan
